866840.name: Siralim 3 - Official Soundtrack
866840.description:
This DLC contains all 24 songs found in Siralim 3!

Track list:

Title Screen - 2:14
Trial of the Gods - 3:22
Arachnid Nest - 3:45
Where the Dead Ships Dwell - 3:18
Azure Dream - 3:23
The Swamplands - 3:34
Eternity's End - 3:47
Faraway Enclave - 3:16
Frostbite Cavern - 3:35
Great Pandemonium - 3:49
Kingdom of Heretics - 3:06
Path of the Damned - 3:15
Refuge of the Magi - 2:39
Torture Chamber - 3:34
Unsullied Meadows - 3:51
The Barrens - 3:18
Cutthroat Jungle - 3:14
Castle Theme - 5:52
Tavern Brawl - 3:16
Battle Theme - 2:33
Boss Battle Theme - 4:16
Super Boss Battle - 3:15
Game Over Theme - 1:17
Victory Theme - 1:05

Written and recorded by Joshua Queen.
